### Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -81.5)

- Burner Inserter (position 43.5, -81.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to fuel supply
- Ensure that the burner mining drills are supplied with fuel regularly to avoid them becoming inactive (Status: NO_FUEL).

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Confirm that the destination entity has space before inserting items. For example, the burner inserter at position (43.5, -81.5) is often waiting for space in its destination.

### Errors when the stone furnace lacks ingredients
- Make sure to supply the stone furnace with the necessary ingredients to keep it operational. It has been observed with status NO_INGREDIENTS multiple times.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked.

#### Important Variables
- `coal`: int
- `iron-ore`: int
- `iron-plate`: int
- `wood`: int
- `iron-gear-wheel`: int
